dcterms:description: The NIST statistical test suite for random and pseudo-random number generators is used to validate the quality of PRNGs by checking statistical properties of the generated sequences.
dcterms:title: NIST statistical test suite for random and pseudo-random number generators

dcterms:creator: Luca Pasqualini
Maurizio Parton
dcterms:description: References the work on pseudo-random number generation using a reinforcement learning approach.

dcterms:creator: Veena Desai
Ravindra Patil

dcterms:description: References the work on using recurrent neural networks to generate pseudo-random number sequences.

dcterms:description: References the foundational work on Long Short-Term Memory networks, which are used in the context of generating pseudo-random numbers.

dcterms:creator: John Schulman

dcterms:description: References the work on Proximal Policy Optimization algorithms, which are utilized in the reinforcement learning approach for PRNG.

dcterms:description: References the work on supervised reinforcement learning with recurrent neural networks, which is relevant to the context of the paper.
